mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_jiazhangname as jiazhangxueshengJiazhangname ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_phone as jiazhangxueshengPhone ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_uuid_number as jiazhangxueshengUuidNumber ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_xuesheng as jiazhangxueshengXuesheng ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_id_number as jiazhangxueshengIdNumber ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_photo as jiazhangxueshengPhoto ,jiazhangxuesheng.banji_types as banjiTypes ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_nianji as jiazhangxueshengNianji ,jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_email as jiazhangxueshengEmail ,jiazhangxuesheng.new_money as newMoney
FROM yijianjianyi a left JOIN jiazhangxuesheng jiazhangxuesheng ON a.jiazhangxuesheng_id = jiazhangxuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiazhangxuesheng_id = #{params.jiazhangxueshengId} )
and a.yijianjianyi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yijianjianyiName},'%')
and a.yijianjianyi_types = #{params.yijianjianyiTypes}
and a.yijianjianyi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yijianjianyiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiazhangxuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_jiazhangname like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengJiazhangname},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengPhone},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengUuidNumber},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_xuesheng like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengXuesheng},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengIdNumber},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_nianji like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengNianji},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.jiazhangxuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiazhangxueshengEmail},'%')
and jiazhangxuesheng.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and jiazhangxuesheng.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
